title: GPT-5.2 Public Preview Integration
description: OpenAI's GPT-5.2 is now available in public preview for GitHub Copilot, bringing advanced long-context AI model capabilities for coding and codebase analysis.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.2 being significantly slower than previous models but with 'extremely marginal improvement over o3'
Some users reported waiting for GPT-5.2 to show up in VS Code and experiencing HTTP 400 server errors initially
Developers noted it's hard to distinguish between different model versions (Instant vs Thinking) in Copilot

title: Auto Model Selection General Availability
description: Auto model selection is now generally available in VS Code, allowing Copilot to automatically select the most appropriate model for specific tasks.

title: Cursor 2.2 with Debug Mode
description: Cursor 2.2 introduces Debug Mode for automatic bug reproduction and fixing, enhanced Plan Mode with visual planning using Mermaid diagrams, multi-agent judging for parallel AI solutions, and pinned chats for better organization.

community_feedback.quote: The new 'Debug' function is pure love! Thank god I love it, I love the approach it takes! Please do not mess it up! Good job guys!
Its been amazing so far - solved bugs that Agent Mode couldn't handle

title: Winter Launch Week 2025
description: Continue's Winter Launch Week focuses on turning fragmented toolchain (Slack, Sentry, GitHub) into a self-healing system with enhanced AI workflows.

title: Slack Integration Research Preview
description: Claude Code now supports Slack integration allowing users to interact with Claude Code directly within Slack channels for collaborative coding and bug fixes.

community_feedback.quote: Anthropic is bringing Claude Code to Slack, allowing developers to delegate coding tasks directly from chat threads

title: Copilot Spaces Public Sharing
description: Copilot Spaces now supports public spaces where anyone with a link can view shared content, plus individual sharing enhancements and code view support.

title: Mission Control Dashboard Redesign
description: New Mission Control dashboard at hub.continue.dev with faster setup for AI workflows that convert devtool signals into automated fixes, PRs, and documentation.

title: Session Management Feature
description: Gemini CLI v0.20.0 introduces rich session management with conversation history viewing, search capabilities, and resume functionality to pick up exactly where work left off.

title: Version 0.71.0 Release
description: Codex CLI 0.71.0 released with major improvements to skills and a fully typed Config API, while also announcing deprecation warnings for chat/completions API transitioning to Responses API in February 2026.
